===Noun===
{{ja-noun|こうおつてん}}

# in [[漢文|''kambun'']], a type of [[返り点|''kaeriten'']] secondary to [[一二点|''ichiniten'']] in which the reading order is marked with 甲, 乙, 丙, 丁, 戊, 己, 庚, 辛, 壬, 癸 indicating the order
